ModMetaData.name: Blocky Doors
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: Blocky Doors 11 new Minecraft-themed doors with original colors: • Acacia Door • Bamboo Door • Birch Door • Crimson Door • Dark Oak Door • Iron Door • Jungle Door • Mangrove Door • Oak Door • Spruce Door • Warped Door +11 stuffable doors with the same look. But stuffable. Doors can be freely rotated if corresponding option is enabled in mod's settings. Extra doors can also be hidden from the Architect menu. Doors will have vanilla material requirements if no Woodworking mods are installed. Verified compatible/supported mods • Blocky Logs • Extended Woodworking • Expanded Woodworking https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-BlockyDoors Support me https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 or https://www.patreon.com/zed_0xff
